items.title: Deep AI Capabilities
items.description: Cutting-edge models like CLIP, FAISS, MUSIQ. Full coverage of computer vision, NLP, and recommendation systems. GPU cluster optimization for 10x+ performance boost.

items.title: Full-Stack Delivery
items.description: From React/Next.js frontend to Python/Node.js backend, databases to message queues, complete architecture design. Docker/K8s deployment with monitoring and alerting all-in-one.

items.title: Rapid Iteration
items.description: Deliver enterprise-grade systems in 2 months. Top-tier team with Tencent/Alibaba/HKUST backgrounds. Agile development, continuous delivery, quick response to changing requirements.
